name: Dynasty Warriors 5
description: In Dynasty Warriors 5, you can become a hero in feudal Japan. Combat enemy armies using weapons, mounts, and special attacks. Dynasty Warriors 5 adds new playable characters, weapons, combos, maps, and game modes. Now, maps are larger, and the enemies are smarter. Dynasty Warriors 5 also adds animal teammates and a revamped weapon system to your arsenal to help you conquer 38 newly-designed maps.
